mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as count, n_note_task_submission_record.note_id, sys_user.nickname, sys_user.id as user_id FROM n_note_task_submission_record LEFT JOIN sys_user ON n_note_task_submission_record.user_id = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN n_note_operation_log ON n_note_task_submission_record.note_id = n_note_operation_log.note_id WHERE n_note_operation_log.operation_type = 1 AND n_note_task_submission_record.note_task_id = #{noteTaskId} GROUP BY n_note_task_submission_record.note_id, sys_user.nickname, sys_user.id;

SELECT n_note_task_submission_record.note_task_id, n_note_task_submission_record.user_id, n_note_task_submission_record.note_id, n_note_task_submission_record.note_history_id, n_note_task_submission_record.note_edit_count, n_note_task_submission_record.submit_time, n_note_task_submission_record.status, n_note.update_time, sys_user.username, sys_user.nickname FROM n_note_task_submission_record LEFT JOIN n_note ON n_note.id = n_note_task_submission_record.note_id LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = n_note_task_submission_record.user_id WHERE n_note_task_submission_record.note_task_id = #{noteTaskId} AND n_note_task_submission_record.status = 0;
